titleStmt.title: Crux Christi, and iudgement executed, or, Divine wisdom crucifying the humane, carnal, devillish, malicious, mad, raging wisdom of the world by His righteous judgements, drawing nearer to its full and perfect manifestation : them shall Josephs and Daniels afflictions end and their imprisonments be no more heard of ... / written and experienced by Richard Coppin.
titleStmt.author: Coppin, Richard, fl. 1646-1659.

notesStmt.note: Running title: Christ crucified and judgement executed.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
